_comment: Created by ianb on 16/12/2014 11:19:02 using v2.3
title: How has the proportion of inpatients informed of who to contact in case of any concern on discharge changed?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of inpatients who reported not being informed of who to contact in case of any concern with their condition or treatment upon returning home has been fairly consistent between 2005 and 2013, with an average of 76%.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Survey of Adult Inpatients
